com.hsoft.codingtest

Interface MarketDataListener


  • public interface MarketDataListener
    The listener interface for receiving information on transactions occurring on market. Implementations of this interface have to be registered on DataProvider using addMarketDataListener method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void transactionOccured(java.lang.String productId, long quantity, double price)
      Invoked when a new transaction is reported by the DataProvider

    • Method Detail

      • transactionOccured

        void transactionOccured(java.lang.String productId,
                      long quantity,
                      double price)
        Invoked when a new transaction is reported by the DataProvider
        Parameters:
        productId - Identifier of the product on which the transaction occurred
        quantity - Quantity of the transaction
        price - Price of the transaction
